reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?
reply.analysis: The app declares the collection of data through various means described in the privacy policy document.
reply.reference: We collect the following types of information when you interact with our Services: Device Identifiers, User Names, Other Information You Provide to Us, Log Information, Location Information. URL: http://www.andyfiregames.com/privacy_policy.html

practices regarding your data and privacy.
Collection of Information
We collect the following types of information when you interact with our Services:
- Device Identifiers. When you interact with our Services, we do not require you to provide information that identifies you personally. Instead, we collect and identify your device primarily using your mobile device advertising identifier, e.g. Apple’s iOS Identifier for Advertising (IDFA) or Google’s Android Advertising ID, as well as other iden...

collect information about you when we receive it from other users, third parties, and affiliates. For example, when you connect your account to third-party services or sign in using a third-party partner (like Google Play Game Services, iOS Game Center or Facebook), we collect information in accordance with the privacy policies and authorization procedures determined by those services.

Privacy Policy
Andy Fire Studio Privacy Policy
Effective Date: Jan 31, 2019
This Privacy Policy explains how information about you is collected, used, and disclosed by Andy Fire Studio and any parent or subsidiary (collectively, “Andy Fire Studio,” “our”, “us” or “we”) when you access or use Andy Fire Studio websites, mobile applications, and other products and services (collectively, the “Services”) or otherwise interact with us. This policy applies to Andy Fire Studio brands, websites, games, ...

use by children. We do not knowingly collect, use, or share information from children under age 16. If you believe that your child may have provided us with personal information, please contact us at support@andyfiregames.com
Data Transfers
Andy Fire Studio is based in the United States and we process and store information in the U.S. As such, we and our service providers may transfer your information to, or store or access it in, jurisdictions that may not provide equivalent levels of data prot...

websites and better understand your online activity. For more information about interest-based ads, or to opt out of having your web browsing information used for interest-based advertising purposes, please visit www.aboutads.info/choices. reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: Device Identifiers, User Names, Other Information You Provide, Log Information, Location Information, Information from Cookies and Other Technologies.

content: Information from Cookies and Other Technologies

reply.analysis: The app collects a variety of data types including device identifiers, user-provided information, log information, location information, and information from cookies and other technologies.
reply.reference: Device Identifiers, User Names, Other Information You Provide to Us, Log Information, Location Information, Information from Cookies and Other Technologies. URL: http://www.andyfiregames.com/privacy_policy.html

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use in various aspects such as delivering, personalizing, and improving services, providing targeted advertisements, saving and associating user activities, carrying out promotions, creating analytics and reports, and detecting and defending against fraudulent, abusive, or unlawful activity.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states the purpose of data collection and use in the different aspects mentioned above, aligning with the requirements of declaring the purpose to users.
reply.reference: We use the information we collect to deliver, personalize, and improve our Services. We also use the information we collect to: - Personalize the Services and provide advertisements, content, or features that are targeted toward your interests; - Save and associate your activity across our Services and your different devices as well as associate any accounts you may use across Andy Fire Studio Services together. We may associate activity and accounts under a single user ID; - Carry out or support promotions; - Create analytics and reports for external parties, including partners, publishers, advertisers, apps, third-parties and the public regarding the use of and trends within our Services and ads, including showing trends to partners regarding general preferences, the effectiveness of ads and information on user experiences; and - Detect and defend against fraudulent, abusive, or unlawful activity. URL: http://www.andyfiregames.com/privacy_policy.html

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt-out of data collection or delete data. In most cases, users can easily delete their data by deleting the app and/or resetting their Advertiser ID. Additionally, users can unlink their social accounts associated with the app to disassociate themselves.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that users can delete their data easily by deleting the app and resetting their Advertiser ID. It also mentions the ability to unlink social accounts to disassociate stored data, indicating that users have control over their data.
reply.reference: In most cases, you can easily delete your data at any time by deleting the app and/or resetting your Advertiser ID. If you have linked a social account (e.g. FaceBook, GPGS or GameCenter), then you can unlink the app with those social providers to disassociate yourself with any stored data. If you have any further questions regarding removal of data, please contact support@andyfiregames.com. URL: http://www.andyfiregames.com/privacy_policy.html

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy indicates that the app may share information with entities like advertising services, analytics services, trusted partners, and for legal and other purposes.

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with affiliated brands, companies, organizations, or individuals outside of Andy Fire Studio with user consent, trusted partners working on their behalf, and for legal and other purposes.

content: Companies, organizations, or individuals outside of Andy Fire Studio with user consent
Trusted partners working on their behalf

reply.analysis: The privacy policy outlines specific situations and conditions under which the app shares data with third parties, including affiliated brands, partners with user consent, trusted partners, and for legal purposes.
reply.reference: With Affiliated Brands. Andy Fire Studio shares information within its affiliated brands. - With Your Consent. We will share information with companies, organizations or individuals outside of Andy Fire Studio when we have your consent to do so. - With Service Providers. We provide user information to trusted partners who work on our behalf based on our instructions and in compliance with appropriate confidentiality measures. - For Legal and Other Purposes. We may access, preserve, and disclose information to investigate, prevent, or take action in connection with... URL: http://www.andyfiregames.com/privacy_policy.html
